title: Motivational Design for Constructivist Learning Network Participation

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: An environment that activates knowledge sharing by linking professional (medical/legal/technical) learners with social studies disciplines

learning_goals: Learners perform knowledge contribution activities at least twice weekly in the learning network within six months
Learners can enhance the quality of the expert collaboration network by 20% using an incentive system
Learners incorporate peer assessment feedback based on constructivist principles by over 80%
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
